isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (1997) - SECTION 3.5: CIRCUIT FUNCTION AND DIAGNOSTICS - ENGINE COOLANT LEVEL SYSTEM (ENGINE PROTECTION) - FAULT DETECTION MANAGEMENT

svcproc.title: FAULT DETECTION MANAGEMENT
svcproc.para: There are no ECM diagnostics for the Engine Coolant Level system. Flash Code 323 will be active when a low coolant situation is present and the Prolink will indicate COOLANT LOW. After the coolant has been restored to proper levels, Flash code 323 will remain as an inactive code and the ECM will log the engine hours of the occurrence.

Refer to Figure 3.66 and
Table 3.13
for the circuit diagram and table for models equipped with metal surge tanks or Figure 3.67 and Table 3.14
for models equipped with plastic surge tanks for the Engine Coolant Level System.
